author: Connor Dabron
comment: Looks great on my Fossil Explorist, customisation options are pretty good.

author: Stan Nowak
comment: The 5 side-buttons disappeared after I selected "Dark Background".  De-selecting didn't restore them so I un-, then re-installed Cronosurf...still no go.  I was happy to buy the Pro version. This gamble worked, all buttons are back. The problem seems to be with the code, not the hardware.  My phone is a Huawei Nova Plus, Android V7.0  Otherwise, Developers, take a bow for an excellent application. Thank you.

reply.author: fruit4droid
reply.content:
Thanks for your review. The 5 side-buttons disappear when you enable the "Android Smartwach Mode" and reappear when you disable it. Otherwise, please contact us so we can look into it: fruit4droid@gmail.com
Your Cronosurf team

author: Peter Sheronov
comment: The best analogue clock simulation. Good enough app, great idea! In my opinion some features required. F.e. auto day/night mode by time or light sensor.
Totally fun and beautiful. What every watchguy wants in a real watch.

author: TIMOTHY DORMINY
comment: 11/17/2017 Keeps losing background wallpaper too complex to set SAMSUNG galaxy S4

reply.author: fruit4droid
reply.content:
If you set an image as the background for the Cronosurf live wallpaper, the image will be saved in the app data cache folder. Please check that there is no app or utility regularly clearing the cache. Some apps allow for a white list.
If you have any further doubts, please contact us: fruit4droid@gmail.com

author: Girish R. Joshi
comment: Awesome & Ultimate creation, keep the good work perpetual.

author: Jacky Woo
comment: Excellent watch app

author: sanusy onuja
comment: A good and well developed watch application. I like every bit of its functionality. I was a beta tester before moving to the pro version. I did not regret paying for the full version, it worth every penny spent.   I will appreciate if you can add the following to your next update   1. Hourly beep 2. Always on Screen but with a dim screen to save battery life. 3. can be made to be part of watch faces on standalone android watches.   I hope all these will be possible on your next update.   thank you.

reply.author: fruit4droid
reply.content:
Thank you very much for your great review!!
Your wishes are noted down and will be considered.
Greetings, the Cronosurf team

title: Best watch app

author: Henk Kok
comment: Four years I have waited for a proper watch widget. Four years I have seen dozens of attempts, but none where convincing. This is even better i.e. a live wallpaper. I still can't fantom why there aren't more of these and in this quality. I mean, look at the great smartwatch designs nowadays, but still none of those for a smartphone. Only this one and it looks great and has loads of UI gadgets crammed into it in such a way a real watchmaker would be jealous :)

author: Avron Boretz
comment: Purchased the pro version. Very promising, love the interface and look. For some reason after a day or two it slowed my Huawei Watch to a crawl, finally becoming unresponsive. Unlinked, factory reset and reinstalled, same thing after ~36 hours. Will retry when the next update arrives.

reply.author: fruit4droid
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. We haven't heard about this issue before. Please contact us: fruit4droid@gmail.com

author: Oomar Dewangree
comment: Love the watch face. Similar to a Citizen Ecodrive chronograph watch or a Casio Edifice watch. Has the look and features to match. Only thing I would like is a bit more customisability of the colours, e.g. being able to set the second hand and minute markers with a different colours. Top app though apart from that.

author: Mike Malley
comment: This is an incredibly well thought out watch face and is the only one in it's class for Android Wear. I'm interested to see if this gets complications support with Wear 2.0... Either way this is on my watch 24/7. Super powerful and on par with some of the most expensive watches out there.

author: Greg Baz
comment: love the watch face. Bought the pro version. Problem is it installed with a diameter of around 26mm and my KW88 is 39mm dia.I cannot seem to adjust the size.Please help

reply.author: fruit4droid
reply.content:
It seems like the automatic detection of the smartwatch screen did not work. Please go to the settings and activate the "Android Smartwatch Mode".
Also, make sure that the smartwatch display mode is "full" and not "small" (on watches that offer the small mode).

author: Дмитрий Матыцин
comment: Hi. It is great dial, but I have the same problem as Avron Boretz. And after some time after device full charged I get huge battery drain. I also use Huawei Watch.

reply.author: fruit4droid
reply.content:
Thanks for your feedback. Please contact us under fruit4droid@gmail.com
so we can determine under which circumstances this might happen.
￼

author: Alan Stoddart
comment: Got a smartwatch?....Get this! This is the best chrono watch by a country mile.It looks amazing on my LG G watch R. Not only does it look great it functions beautifully with very little battery drain........6 stars.
title: Bop

author: Corrupt Ranger
comment: Watch works fine, offers great functionality, and looks good.  Also the support of the developer in case of problems is very fast and helpful.  All in all i am very pleased with the purchase an i can definetly recommend this app.

author: Tito Massimiliano Gattola
comment: Please add notifications' counter since AW 2.0 changed notifications method. Other watchfaces' builders are doing this. Don't be late!

author: Jason Ng
comment: just bought the pro version. love it. however.  doesn't seem to be able to     turn on the live wallpaper on my Samsung S7 edge?

reply.author: fruit4droid
reply.content: Thanks! To activate the Live Wallpaper, please use the same method as for any other Live Wallpaper. The standard procedure under most Android devices: long press on an empty area of the home screen and from the appearing menu select Live Wallpapers. If still unclear, please contact us: fruit4droid@gmail.com

author: Joe Fiems
comment: Very, very nice.  Didn't know what I was looking for til I found this one.  Grand kids love it too!

author: Charl Gouws
comment: Looks really good. I especially like the unique monthly calendar ring. Some more button functionality for the live wallpaper would be nice (for example the quick settings when clicking in the center). On the whole, a really high quality, expensive looking app.

author: Matthew Inchley
comment: WHEN ONLY THE BEST WILL DO, Cromosurf's it. If you love tecky, plenty to fiddle with and heaps of USEFUL adjustments, DO not bother with any other as they simply will NOT do......!

Amazing detail, function and appearance!  One mode I'd love to see would be a "CONV"ersion mode.  Turn the date wheel into a flight whiz wheel or slide rule.  aka Citizen Nighthawk  Keep up the great work!

author: Giuseppe Sanfilippo
comment: This watch face is really nice, full of functionality and shown information. The support is really kind, clever and quick.
title: Wonderful watch face

author: Stephen Fishwick
comment: The best watch face out there. It's all I use on my Moto 360 2nd edition. So good I payed for the pro version. Enjoy 😁

author: John Newman
comment: This watch face is exceptional in every way. Beautiful design and faultless operation combine to create the perfect compliment to my Huawei watch. Thank you!

author: frank parulan
comment: Thank you for the prompt reply. Solved the problem!

reply.author: fruit4droid
reply.content:
Both the free and the pro version can coexist on the phone and watch. Please see if you can find the solution in the FAQ area of our support site: cronosurf.com/support 
If you could not solve the issue, please contact us: fruit4droid@gmail.com
We will be glad to help.

author: Chris Chiu
comment: Great watch, love it. I would like to see the monthly calendar ring reflect the actual number of days in the current month.

reply.author: fruit4droid
reply.content:
Thanks for your rating and feedback! The reason for this is that the app is based on a watch design concept which is for a physical watch (in the future) with real hands and date rings.
If you want to quickly know the last day of the current month, just press the button [SET] when in TME mode and the second hand will point to it.

author: Brian Nickerson
comment: I love the watch face but do you have any plans to allow the user to change the background color?

author: Fadi H
comment: Download the watch and I can't setup on my Samsung gear 3. I hope I can.

reply.author: fruit4droid
reply.content: The Samsung Gear S3 has its own operating system called Tizen. The development of Cronosurf for Tizen is currently being considered and could start soon.

author: Joe Rogers
comment: Live wallpaper setting in "settings" grayed out for Galaxy S8

reply.author: fruit4droid
reply.content:
This is normal. The setting will become available once the Live Wallpaper is active. For this, use the standard procedure to activate any Live Wallpaper on the device. If you have further questions, please contact us:
fruit4droid@gmail.com

author: Raul Crespo
comment: Very nice style watch before one month tested then new purchased.

author: Oscar van Dillen
comment: Beautifully built very complete watch, timer, time app! Worth every penny

reply.author: fruit4droid
reply.content: Thanks for your rating! The next update will allow you for 5 and 9 minutes. We are already considering to extend the indication to 2 digits to allow for longer times soon. Stay tuned!

author: Davide Monge
comment: Absolutely stunning. I have smartwatch version for my Samsung S3. A must have.

author: Micheal Lennon
comment: Does this work on the Samsung gear 3? If so how do I use it?

reply.author: fruit4droid
reply.content: Sorry. As per today, Cronosurf runs on Android devices only. The Gear S3 runs on the operating system Tizen. However, the development of Cronosurf for Tizen is currently being considered. Stay tuned.

author: Walter Del Grecco
comment: Muy buena aplicación. Impecable estética. Lo uso siempre. Felicitaciones a los desarrolladores.

author: Rick du Toit
comment: Very well made little app, well done.

author: G.I. Joe
comment: great job maybe the best for my x5

author: Chris Panczyk
comment: Kills battery

reply.author: fruit4droid
reply.content:
Cronosurf was carefully designed to have a minimal impact on CPU and battery usage. Please send more details about this to fruit4droid@gmail.com
We will do our best to find a solution.
The Cronosurf team

author: substrate001
comment: I've been using the pro version of this for a while and I really love it. I hope the developer keeps updating and refining this app, because it's my.favorite live wallpaper. It's battery consumption is low and it's a nice little Conversation Piece when someone sees my phone screen.
title: Now we just need a real one...

author: Simon Hutt
comment: Now all it needs is to available on lock screen without having to open application first and the reset each time. Fantastic app and looks really good
title: Lock screen
